defaultValue: Campaign settings - Only apply to new saves

fieldDescription: Enables the Lethia system in a corner of the map, home to the planet Kassadar.

defaultValue: Dynamic settings - Applied on save load

fieldDescription: Enables powerful automated ships that will spawn in Legio Infernalis fleets once the player has reached certain milestones.
Gives Daemons adaptive enhancement scaling with player fleet power like gaining additional S-mods.
Lowers milestone requirements for Daemons to start spawning.
Greatly increases the number of Daemons in Legio fleets and the quality of their AI cores.
Lets Legio learn all blueprints known to pirates.
Adds unusual drone ships to Remnant fleets.
